content.raw:
```
#!xml

<sdf version="1.5">
  <world name="world">
    <model name="default_body">
	<link name="default_link">
	   <visual name="basic_bot_visual0">
           <geometry>
            <plane>
              <size>10 10</size>
            </plane>
          </geometry>
	</visual>
	</link>	
 	<joint name="atlas" type="revolute">
        <parent>default_link</parent>
        <child>world</child>
        <axis>
          <xyz>0 1 0</xyz>
          <limit>
            <upper>10</upper>
            <lower>10</lower>
          </limit>
        </axis>
      </joint>
   </model>
  </world>
</sdf>
 
```

          
 
 Is an example of an SDF that would cause the crash in Dart. Version is 4.1.0 This crash occurs when DART is selected as the physics engine.

The print out from terminal is

***** Internal Program Error - assertion (dartChildLink.get() != __null) failed in virtual void gazebo::physics::DARTJoint::Init():
/home/skylion/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTJoint.cc(84): dartChildLink pointer is NULL
